bibl.title: A Fifth-Century Contract on Wood in the Archaeological Institute at Trier.
bibl.note: Archaeological collection at the University of Trier, on loan from a private owner. Contract of lease and loan, first words from a contract of sale. Oxyrhynchite nome, AD 475.
Shelton John C., A Fifth-Century Contract on Wood in the Archaeological Institute at Trier.
